quotes.quote: As I see it, every day you do one of two things: build health or produce disease in yourself.
quotes.author: Adelle Davis

quotes.quote: Every patient carries her or his own doctor inside.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Fitness - If it came in a bottle, everybody would have a great body.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
quotes.author: Dr. Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Be not slow to visit the sick.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes

quotes.quote: I have never cared much for fish - it floats in the belly as much as in the pond.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Preserving health by too severe a rule is a worrisome malady.
quotes.author: Frank Duff

quotes.quote: It is amazing how much crisper the general experience of life becomes when your body is given a chance to develop a little strength.
quotes.author: George Dennison Prentice

quotes.quote: What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease.
quotes.author: Hannah Green

quotes.quote: Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: A wise man should consider that health is the greatest of human blessings, and learn how by his own thought to derive benefit from his illnesses.
quotes.author: Izaak Walton

quotes.quote: Look to your health; and if you have it, praise God and value it next to conscience; for health is the second blessing that we mortals are capable of, a blessing money can't buy.
quotes.author: Jackie Mason

quotes.quote: It's no longer a question of staying healthy. It's a question of finding a sickness you like.
quotes.author: Jadelr and Cristina Cordova

quotes.quote: If you trust Google more than your doctor then maybe it's time to switch doctors.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Now there are more overweight people in America than average-weight people. So overweight people are now average. Which means you've met your New Year's resolution.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: You can either hold yourself up to the unrealistic standards of others, or ignore them and concentrate on being happy with yourself as you are.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When I walk into my kitchen today, I am not alone. Whether we know it or not, none of us is. We bring fathers and mothers and kitchen tables, and every meal we have ever eaten. Food is never just food. It's also a way of getting at something else: who we are, who we have been, and who we want to be.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Getting my lifelong weight struggle under control has come from a process of treating myself as well as I treat others in every way.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: A vigorous five-mile walk will do more good for an unhappy but otherwise healthy adult than all the medicine and psychology in the world.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Pain (any pain--emotional, physical, mental) has a message. The information it has about our life can be remarkably specific, but it usually falls into one of two categories: "We would be more alive if we did more of this," and, "Life would be more lovely if we did less of that." Once we get the pain's message, and follow its advice, the pain goes away.
quotes.author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: The more severe the pain or illness, the more severe will be the necessary changes. These may involve breaking bad habits, or acquiring some new and better ones.
quotes.author: Redd Foxx

quotes.quote: Health consists of having the same diseases as one's neighbors.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: One of the most sublime experiences we can ever have is to wake up feeling healthy after we have been sick.
quotes.author: Robin Norwood

quotes.quote: Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Quit worrying about your health. It'll go away.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: Make your own recovery the first priority in your life.
A Hospital is no place to be sick.
Most men's awareness doesn't extend past their dinner plates.
